Replying to @yoavrheims 2018-01-11 09:56
@yoavrheims @Netlify Hi Yoav. Looking forward to that post. The free hosting has some soft limits: 100GB storage, 100GB per month network bandwidth. This goes up to 1TB for the paid accounts. There is also a hard limit of 3 deploys per minute. All of these should give everyone plenty of headroom.
